title: Site Reliability Engineer
description: A proactive and skilled Site Reliability Engineer (SRE) to be the guardian of systems' uptime, performance, and scalability, building the foundation of infrastructure excellence for a rapidly growing fintech venture in South Africa.
responsibilities: Managing and monitoring infrastructure for ERP systems, applications, APIs, and databases
Ensuring high availability and scalability of production environments
Administering cloud environments and establishing CI/CD workflows for rapid deployments
Setting up monitoring, logging, and alerting systems to track system health
Implementing backup, recovery, and failover processes to ensure data integrity
Hardening infrastructure security and enforcing access controls
Diagnosing and resolving incidents efficiently with minimal downtime
qualifications: A minimum of 3 years of experience in a System Administration, DevOps, or SRE role
Tertiary Qualification in Computer Science, Information Technology, or Related Field
Strong experience with Linux-based production environments (preferably Ubuntu)
Strong experience with cloud hosting platforms such as AWS or Google Cloud
Proficiency in scripting and automation using Bash, Python, or similar languages
Experience with containerization (Docker) and CI/CD tools
Familiarity with infrastructure as code tools like Terraform or Ansible
Experience with database administration (PostgreSQL), networking, DNS, and load balancing
Knowledge of web security best practices, including firewalls, SSL, and API rate limiting
Strong experience with monitoring, logging, and alerting tools (e.g., Grafana, Prometheus)
Experience with fast recovery planning and disaster mitigation
Excellent problem-solving, troubleshooting, and communication skills
